## Descriptives for the SD Data

### Dax & Fiona 

```{r, message = FALSE}
#library(mosaic)
favstats(~Dax.Fiona$`SD (s)`)
favstats(~Dax.Fiona$`S-Delta (s)`)
gf_line(Dax.Fiona$`SD (s)`~Dax.Fiona$Session...13) %>% gf_line(Dax.Fiona$`S-Delta (s)`~Dax.Fiona$Session...13, col = 'red')
```

### Mason & Coffee

```{r}
favstats(~Mason.Coffee$`SD (Attention)`)
favstats(~Mason.Coffee$`S-Delta (No Attention)`)
gf_line(Mason.Coffee$`SD (Attention)`~Mason.Coffee$Session) %>% gf_line(Mason.Coffee$`S-Delta (No Attention)`~ Mason.Coffee$Session, col = 'red')
```

### Gunner & Cato

```{r}
favstats(~Gunner.Cato$`SD (Attention)`)
favstats(~Gunner.Cato$`S-Delta (No Attention)`)
gf_line(Gunner.Cato$`SD (Attention)`~ Gunner.Cato$Session) %>% gf_line(Gunner.Cato$`S-Delta (No Attention)`~ Gunner.Cato$Session, color = 'red')
```

### Misha & Houston

```{r}
favstats(~Misha.Houston$`SD (Attention)...3`)
favstats(~Misha.Houston$`S-Delta (No Attention)...4`)
gf_line(Misha.Houston$`SD (Attention)...3`~ Misha.Houston$Session...2) %>% gf_line(Misha.Houston$`S-Delta (No Attention)...4`~Misha.Houston$Session...2, color = 'red')
```
